resource: 1002327.vtc=true 1002327.description=Trailer-Sway Control (TSC) is an electronic system designed to help the driver maintain vehicle control under adverse conditions. It is not a substitute for safe driving practices. Factors including speed, road conditions and driver steering input can all affect whether TSC will be effective in preventing a loss of control. Please see your Ownerâ€™s Manual for further details. 1002327.derived=false 1002327.source=MANUAL_IMPORT
